tweets.text: Why aren‚Äôt you taking our suffering seriously, what will it take? Wealth should not be put before health @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

As with many people, I was unable to sleep last night because hydrogen sulfide from Walley's Quarry filled my home again. The lack of accountability or care for our health and the environment is heartbreaking.

5/5 Lastly: üôè to those who kindly came to share experiences of living with this odour.

I‚Äôve read & listened to social media, letters to me / @EnvAgencyMids & news reports so have been struck by the #mentalhealth impacts already but hearing from people f2f is always v powerful.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

tweets.text: @cleanairdayuk We would love clean air for our children, can your organisation help the children of Newcastle under Lyme suffering health effects from air contamination? @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK

We were notified by @thameswater of a sewage discharge on the @RiverChess yesterday. They appear to be daily at the moment, suggest great care and avoid contact with river water until further notice. Had 82 discharges already in 2021, in each of the first 5 months of the year.

The abundant fish in #RiverLark at #Mildenhall are most diseased &/or damaged I've ever seen. A huge amount of fin rot in the roach. Quite distressing swimming amongst such sick fish.  The river is full of gungy sediment floating down, everything covered in silt & algae. 3/3 https://t.co/CZLH7W8eHE

@SianieRoo @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDInnisEA what have you done to ensure the massive gassing of 1000s of residents doesn't happen tonight, if nothing then evacuate us now, allowing humans to to be poisoned by toxic gas will never be acceptable & you will be held to account. #stopthestink

Good questions for the public enquiry @NewsNBC has asked for into @EnvAgency shockingly poor regulation of @RedIndustries2 landfill leading to thousands of people suffering  @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @BorisJohnson @PHE_EoEngland https://t.co/fR0LDGh4gN
